atlas_species()#

Arguments for atlas_species() are:

galah.atlas_species(
     taxa=None,
     verbose=False,
)

This function is mainly used to determine the taxonomy of a particular genus. An example of its output is below.

import galah
galah.atlas_species(taxa="Heleioporus")

which returns

    kingdom  ...                  vernacular_names
0  Animalia  ...              Western Spotted Frog
1  Animalia  ...              Giant Burrowing Frog
2  Animalia  ...  Hooting Frog, Western Marsh Frog
3  Animalia  ...                      Moaning Frog
4  Animalia  ...        Plains Frog, Whooping Frog
5  Animalia  ...                         Sand Frog

[6 rows x 9 columns]
